definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Bowel or omentum may herniate alongside the drain .
sentences.chinese: 肠管或网膜可能沿引流物疝出。

sentences.english: Bowel may herniate alongside a drain, with resulting obstruction.
sentences.chinese: 肠管可能沿著引流物疝出，导致梗阻。

sentences.english: Objective:To probe into application of helical nasointestinal tube for patients with carcinoma of gastric cardia and nursing care of them.
sentences.chinese: 探讨螺旋型鼻肠管在胃贲门癌病人护理中的应用效果。

sentences.english: Enterectomy is necessary if it has a part of intestine tube necrosis.
sentences.chinese: 如果有肠管坏死必要时行肠管部分切除术。

sentences.english: Enterectomy is necessary if it has a part of intestine tube necrosis.
sentences.chinese: 如果有肠管坏死必要时行肠管部分切除术。

sentences.english: The gross appearance of the bowel may be normal from the serosal surface.
sentences.chinese: 肠管肉眼所见，浆膜面可以正常。

sentences.english: B CT scan of the lower abdomen shows beaking and collapsed bowel loops at the retrocecal recess.
sentences.chinese: 下腹部CT扫描显示盲肠后隐窝处肠管塌陷呈鸟嘴征。

sentences.english: Peony and licorice decoction had inhibiting effect on the rabbit's intestine invito.
sentences.chinese: 芍药甘草汤对家兔离体肠管呈抑制作用。

sentences.english: Injury to organs near the ovaries, such as the bladder, bowel, or blood vessels.
sentences.chinese: 刺伤卵巢旁边的器官，比如膀胱，肠管或血管。

sentences.english: The gut will pass through the defect into the chest.
sentences.chinese: 肠管可经过缺损进入胸腔。

sentences.english: It can even grow on your bladder or intestines.
sentences.chinese: 甚至能在膀胱和肠管生长。

sentences.chinese: 肠管或网膜可能沿引流物疝出。

ascending colon (anatomy)/first section of large intestine
